title: OCE Spring Qualifiers Tournament - 18 & 25 September!
body:
Hey everyone!
I am hosting an online, free to enter tournament titled the ''OCE Spring Qualifiers". It's your chance to gather up with a bunch of friends and enjoy the competitive aspect of League of Legends! If you're interested, sign up using the events page link: http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/events/214401/
Make sure you have all 5 members registering, and be prepared, as the tournament will be held next week on Sunday, the 18th of September, followed by the finals on the 25th of September!

Happy gaming everyone,
lmperius
God at League of Legends and Tournament Host
